subsection.title: Powers of the Form a^{m/n}
subsection.p: In the last section, we considered powers of the form a^{1/n}, such as x^{1/3} and x^{âˆ’1/4}, and saw that a^{1/n} is equivalent to the root \sqrt[n]{a}. What about other fractional exponents? What meaning can we attach to a power of the form a^{m /n}?
